title: 222B-Norse Legends: It Takes a Pillage
itunes:title: 222B-Norse Legends: It Takes a Pillage
description:
A packed episode with Thor, Odin, mythological dwarves, sword arms, and Valhalla, all ending up with a beautiful double wedding...which ends somehow worse than the last time we visited a giant wedding on this podcast. We're finishing up the saga of Egil and Asmund.

The creature this time is little mucus boy, and if you're a villain, you don't want to get caught monologuing around this sticky, moist little hero.

--

Sponsors:

Acorn TV: Try Acorn TV free for 30 days by going to http://acorn.tv and using our code: legends (all lowercast)

Grove Collaborative: check out http://grove.co/legends and choose your free gift with your first order of $30 or more.

Best Fiends: It's super fun and we're all really into it. Download it free: http://bestfiends.com

Audible: Visit http://audible.com/myths or text "myths" to 500-500 to try Audible for free for 30 days!

Daily Harvest: So. Good. And so easy on those days you don't feel like cooking. Go to http://dailyharvest.com and enter the promo code "myths" to get $25 off your first box!

--
